short_summary: A 3-Point Hitch Plot Seeder to be delivered to the agriculture farm.
full_summary:
### 3-Point Hitch Plot Seeder - Request for Proposal
#### Tender Reference Number: WS4204220517-Doc4500485868
#### Publication Date: March 22, 2024
#### Closing Date: May 8, 2024, at 14:00 EST (Amended to May 1, 2024, at 14:00 EST)

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking proposals from qualified contractors to provide one (1) 3-Point Hitch Plot Seeder to Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada. The equipment is required to be delivered to the research farm at 410 Lowe Road, Saskatoon, Saskatchewan.

**Key Details:**

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive Open Bidding
* **Review Process:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* **Regions of Delivery:** Saskatoon, Saskatchewan

**Eligibility Requirements:**

* The contractor must have the necessary expertise and resources to provide the required equipment.
* The contractor must have the necessary certification and approvals to operate in Canada.

**Bid Requirements:**

* All bids must be submitted electronically via the Ariba Discovery platform.
* All bids must include all necessary supporting documentation and bid submission materials.
* The bid submission deadline has been amended to May 1, 2024, at 14:00 EST.

**Contact Information:**

* Cory Awid, PSPC, (il-lui/he-him) [cory.awid@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:cory.awid@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Note: The bid submission deadline has been amended to May 1, 2024, at 14:00 EST. Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by May 1, 2024, at 14:00 EST. Failure to comply with this requirement will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
